category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 33 (Composition and Function of the Board of Directors)
contents: Article 33 (Composition and Functions of the Board of Directors) ① The Board of Directors is composed of the directors specified in Article 23 (2). ② The Board of Directors deliberates and decides on the following matters: 1. Matters pertaining to business plans and budgets, 2. Enactment and revision of regulations, 3. Matters pertaining to incorporation of basic assets, 4. Membership of associate member organizations and recognized organizations. Approval, demotion and expulsion, 5. Deletion March 13, 2019, 6. Matters regarding the establishment and operation of various committees, 7. Consent on appointment and dismissal of the Secretary General, 8. Matters delegated at the general meeting 9. Matters regarding the submission of agenda to the general meeting Matter 10. Other important matters
